thread.section_title: Stellenbosch Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Stellenbosch Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: helencann
title: Great location
text:
We stayed here for two nights, great location, safe underground parking and friendly staff. Lovely gift of a bottle of wine as it is our honeymoon!
Room was on ground floor near to kitchen and patio area which meant that it was pretty noisy, so we didn't get much sleep on our first night - and you're woken up pretty early when people start moving around for breakfast. If we had been there any longer than two nights we would have asked to switch rooms. I'd recommend requesting not to stay in room 22 if you are a light sleeper!
The room was lovely, very clean and had a good sized bathroom.
Breakfast was great, lots of lovely restaurants, bars and shops nearby. Speedy laundry service too!
